extendedInfo.description: Madness impassable offroad is now available to anyone!Go to truly hard-challenging levels and try to complete them.Earn money and try to set up the necessary combination of upgrades for each level.Realistic car physics, realistic upgrades.Now 8 levels.v1.8CHANGED: Improved car stability in left-right directions.CHANGED: Level 1 simplified.CHANGED: Level 7 optimized.CHANGED: Added level 8: Mountains.v1.7FIXED: Glitch with the sound of the engine.CHANGED: Improved responsiveness pedals.CHANGED: Design of the garage.v1.6FIXED: Some background design defects at garage and level 5. CHANGED: Splash screen.v1.5FIXED: Smoke incorrect color, suspension upgrade 3 wrong picture.v1.4FIXED: Upgrades not worked sometimes.v1.3FIXED: Menu worked incorrect sometimes.

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: It needs more levels I beat them in no time really great game does have some issuse but all games do none are perfect that I have every played
reviews.author: darrion ellsworth

reviews.title: Fun game!
reviews.comment: I do wish there was a larger selection of vehicles and/or parts, especially since there\'s only one truck. Aside from that, it\'s worth the $1.00 it takes to play.
reviews.author: David G

reviews.title: Accelerator and break does not like to work wast of money
reviews.comment: Game has so much lag and buttons don\'t like to work wast of my money.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Kept me playing
reviews.comment: The game definitely needs some tweaking but it kept me playing. It seems the new update fixed the random tipping over. I like this game and wouldnt mind seeing more veriety.. Change jeep colors maybe. Different little mods to buy?
reviews.author: Hunter Vetticus

reviews.title: Hmmm
reviews.comment: How do you fix the lag? But e stars because its awesome concept love it just wishnit worked
reviews.author: Jesse Johnson

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: This game is pretty good it needs a lot for 5 stars. I\'d like to see other trucks and more performance upgrades and levels. Will definitely give 5 stars when some things are worked out
reviews.author: Tyde Jones

reviews.title: Nice game
reviews.comment: Needs an update for more levels and brakes dont work like they should other than that beat it in like 10 minutes
reviews.author: Nate Smith

reviews.title: Sweet game
reviews.comment: I love the game but the gas hardly works. You keep pushing the pedal one minute it works then it just stops without letting off. Get this fixed then it be worth the money and 5 stars.
reviews.author: David Turk II

reviews.title: Great game but
reviews.comment: If you could possibly put IN A manual gearbox as a option. And put it where you could drive in two wheel drive plus have a 4 lo 4 hi switch and be able too lock front or rear or both lockers hell I\'d pay 5 or 10 dollars for that and do like off road trail riding and rock crawling and mudding and hill climbs and tug o war with other opponents and there built rides more vehicles from trucks too cars or 4 wheelers and dump trucks...more levels and be able too turn with touch pad or touch joystick...for all that..easily a twenty dollar game and is pay it and I\'m sure others would too
reviews.author: David Rothgeb

reviews.title: Great game but lags
reviews.comment: This game is sick but it lags its entertaining but it don\'t let me go passed the second level they should get that fixed
reviews.author: Cesar Cabanillas

reviews.title: Fix lag
reviews.comment: It so slow its only like 1 fps
reviews.author: Soap AI

reviews.title: Not good
reviews.comment: It stops at the first level in the water
reviews.author: Sean Bryson

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Great game, just want more levels and upgrades!
reviews.author: Adam O

reviews.title: Shocking
reviews.comment: Don\'t get this game, lags if you\'ve not got a large memory. When you press power it keeps toggling between the right pedal and power. Just awful :(
reviews.author: Alasdair Watson

reviews.title: Don\'t waste your money
reviews.comment: This is ridiculous. Game is unplayable due to lag even on s4. How can you charge people for this?
reviews.author: Liam Faurie

reviews.title: Very nice
reviews.comment: This game is simple but cool, it needs a new update for more maps and trucks. Overall I like it
reviews.author: David Ramirez

reviews.title: Crap.
reviews.comment: Has to much lag and the buttons work 10% of the time.  Needs fixed
reviews.author: kenny stahl

reviews.title: Not even worth 1 dollar
reviews.comment: Very laggy and horribly physics will have your paper Jeep barrel rolling up hills.
reviews.author: Alexander Stillwagon

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: the app update claims that the game has eight levels I only have four levels and the game force closes all the time. No lag tho
reviews.author: dereck baker

reviews.title: Waste of money
reviews.comment: To much lag and don\'t work rite
reviews.author: Chris Bohannon
